_header: Jesu as Thou art our savior
_description: A song to Christ — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Jhesu jhesu jhesu jhesu / Saf vs alle thorw thi vertu’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Jhesu as thou art our sauyourThat thou saue vs fro
                    dolour…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Ayens hym that we mown wake& saue vs alle throw thi
                    vertu
